item.title: Daaku Maharaaj director Bobby expresses gratitude in a heartfelt note - 123telugu
item.description:
Director Bobby Expresses Heartfelt Gratitude For Daaku Maharaaj

Published on Jan 12, 2025 7:24 am IST

Director Bobby Kolli's film, Daaku Maharaaj, featuring Nandamuri Balakrishna, releases today. He took to social media to share a heartfelt note reflecting on the film's journey and expressing gratitude to his team.

  • Bobby expresses excitement for audiences to experience the film after two years of production.
  • The film tells the story of a noble man fighting for others, transcending the typical action entertainer genre.
  • Bobby thanks fans and acknowledges the contributions of the entire team, including cast members and crew.
  • The film features a notable cast including Bobby Deol as the antagonist and music composed by Thaman.
  • Bobby ends his note with the slogan, “Jai Balayya!” inviting everyone to enjoy the film this Sankranthi.
Dear audience,
Today is an incredibly special day for me and the entire team of #DaakuMaharaaj.
It marks the culmination of 2 years of passion and hard work.

In conclusion, Bobby's heartfelt message showcases the dedication behind Daaku Maharaaj and invites fans to celebrate its release.

item.title: Weekly horoscope from January 12 to January 18: Your luck for this week; see which signs have lady luck smiling for them - India Today
item.description:
Weekly Horoscope from January 12 to January 18: Your Luck for This Week

Published On: Jan 12, 2025 | Published By: Ayush Bisht

This weekly horoscope reveals the luck and predictions for each zodiac sign from January 12 to January 18, providing insights into personal and professional aspects of life.

  • Aries: On a roll with solutions and potential recognition; students to excel.
  • Taurus: A crisis averted; focus on the present to move forward.
  • Gemini: Strengthen community connections; mental health improves.
  • Cancer: Assertive leadership; family harmony; trust your judgment on investments.
  • Leo: Time to slow down and appreciate life; recoveries in health.
  • Virgo: Work feels tedious; focus on peace at home.
  • Libra: Be aware of indirect actions from others; love life gets busier.
  • Scorpio: Calm approach helps in managing stress and family matters.
  • Sagittarius: Nostalgia returns with a focus on lessons learned.
  • Capricorn: Transition brings new routines; adaptability is key.
  • Aquarius: Productivity spikes with multiple projects; watch for manipulative individuals.
  • Pisces: A quiet period for rest and reflection; consider spiritual practices.

item.title: Love and Relationship Horoscope for January 12, 2025 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Love and Relationship Horoscope for January 12, 2025

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

This horoscope focuses on various zodiac signs and their love predictions for today, emphasizing the need to let go of the past and embrace new romantic opportunities.

  • Aries: Let go of the past to make room for new opportunities.
  • Taurus: Release unsuitable connections to explore new romantic experiences.
  • Gemini: Communicate your need for space to strengthen love.
  • Cancer: Confidence will attract romance; seize special moments.
  • Leo: Opportunity to connect with others based on honesty and trust.
  • Virgo: Engage in conversations that may lead to romantic connections.
  • Libra: Embrace your playful side to attract new and exciting connections.
  • Scorpio: Focus on your own needs to create opportunities for intimacy.
  • Sagittarius: Take charge of your love life and express your desires.
  • Capricorn: Be open to interactions that could lead to meaningful conversations.
  • Aquarius: Embrace change and release past attachments to allow new love.
  • Pisces: Reconnect with someone from your past for a fresh start.
"The strength to let go will lead to the relationship you are looking for." - Neeraj Dhankher

The horoscope illustrates the importance of addressing past relationships while remaining open to new love possibilities, encouraging self-awareness and proactive engagement in love.

item.title: Weekly Horoscope Pisces, January 12-18, 2025 predicts physical well-being - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Weekly Horoscope for Pisces: January 12-18, 2025 – Focus on Physical Well-being

Date: January 12, 2025

Source: Dr. J.N. Pandey

This week, Pisces, you'll find clarity in relationships, boost career prospects, and manage finances wisely while focusing on emotional and physical well-being.

  • Effective communication improves relationships.
  • Career opportunities increase, allowing for talent showcase.
  • Financial caution is advised; review spending habits.
  • Health should be prioritized; include exercise and balanced diet.

Notable Quotes:

This week offers you a chance to deepen your emotional connections.

The week encourages teamwork at work to achieve success and set long-term goals.

Maintain a strong work ethic to advance in your career.

Conclusion:

This week is pivotal for Pisces in terms of personal growth, emotional health, and professional opportunities.

item.title: Weekly Horoscope Capricorn, January 12-18, 2025 predicts a rewarding week - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Capricorn Weekly Horoscope: A Rewarding Week Ahead (January 12-18, 2025)

This week promises growth, insights, and stability across love, career, and finances for Capricorn. Health remains vital for maintaining balance.

  • Growth in love connections and career clarity
  • Financial stability improves through wise resource management
  • Health focus on balance and self-care practices
  • New professional opportunities recognized by colleagues
“Maintaining a balanced lifestyle is crucial for physical and mental well-being.”

This week presents a favorable environment for Capricorn, with significant opportunities for personal and professional growth.

item.title: Weekly Horoscope Sagittarius, January 12-18, 2025 predicts promising opportunities - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sagittarius Weekly Horoscope Today, January 12-18, 2025

Published on January 12, 2025 by Dr. J.N. Pandey

This week brings promising opportunities for Sagittarius in love and career. You may encounter meaningful connections and chances to advance at work.

Takeaway: This week offers Sagittarius chances for significant personal and professional growth, but attention to health and finances is essential.

item.title: Weekly Horoscope Scorpio, January 12-18, 2025 predicts a harmonious week - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Scorpio Weekly Horoscope January 12-18, 2025

Scorpios are encouraged to stay open to possibilities while maintaining balance in finances and health, fostering a productive and rewarding week.

item.title: Official: Thalapathy69 is the remake of Balakrishna’s Bhagavanth Kesari - 123telugu
item.description:
Official: Thalapathy69 is the remake of Balakrishna’s Bhagavanth Kesari

Published on Jan 12, 2025

Thalapathy Vijay is currently working on his last film, Thalapathy69, which will be his focus before shifting entirely to politics. The film is directed by H. Vinoth and is in production, with confirmatory remarks about its basis being a remake of Balakrishna’s Bhagavanth Kesari.

  • Thalapathy Vijay has shown a keen interest in Bhagavanth Kesari, watching it five times.
  • VTV Ganesh confirmed the remake at a promotional event, detailing Vijay's involvement and his initial reluctance from other directors to adapt the film.
“Vijay sir liked Bhagavanth Kesari pretty much. He watched the film for five times.” - VTV Ganesh

This news heightens anticipation among fans of both Vijay and the original film.

item.title: Weekly Horoscope Virgo, January 12-18, 2025 predicts exciting possibilities - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Virgo Weekly Horoscope Today, Jan 12-18, 2025

Date: Jan 12, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

This week brings clarity and focus for Virgo, encouraging thoughtful decisions across love, career, finances, and health. Effective communication is emphasized as key.

  • This week, Virgo natives will gain clear perspectives on their lives.
  • There are opportunities to deepen connections in personal relationships.
  • In careers, staying organized and setting achievable goals is crucial.
  • Financial assessments are recommended to ensure long-term stability.
  • Health should be prioritized with attention to diet, exercise, and mental well-being.
"Keep communication open and honest."

This week encourages Virgos to remain deliberate in their decisions, for both personal and professional growth.

item.title: Weekly Horoscope Leo, January 12-18, 2025 predicts a week of growth - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Leo Weekly Horoscope Today, January 12-18, 2025 to know your astrological predictions. This week brings growth and new opportunities.

Date: January 12, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

This week brings growth and new opportunities for Leos. Stay open-minded and seize the chances coming your way for personal and professional advancement.

In conclusion, this week offers Leos a chance for significant personal and professional growth, along with new relationships and opportunities that should be approached with caution and planning.

item.title: T'gana govt withdraws orders allowing ticket price hike for Ram Charan starrer 'Game Changer' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Telangana Government Withdraws Ticket Price Hike for 'Game Changer'

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Telangana government announced the withdrawal of orders that allowed a hike in ticket prices for the film 'Game Changer' starring Ram Charan. This decision follows directives from the High Court regarding public interest, health, and safety.

  • The government had initially allowed an increase in ticket prices by ₹150 for multiplex and ₹100 for single theatres for shows on January 10.
  • From January 11 to 19, an additional ₹100 and ₹50 was permitted for multiplex and single theatres, respectively.
  • Early morning shows are now prohibited until further notice.
“The government had initially allowed ticket price hikes despite previous criticisms regarding public safety.”

This decision emphasizes the government's commitment to public safety following incidents in recent screenings.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Raveena Tandon and Salman Khan share nostalgic moment; the latter tells Rasha, “Tumhari mum - The Times of India
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Raveena Tandon and Salman Khan Share Nostalgic Moment

Publication Date: N/A Source: N/A

In a heartfelt moment on Bigg Boss 18, Salman Khan reminisced with actress Raveena Tandon, recalling lighter moments from their past and teasing discussions about family.

  • Salman Khan mentions Rasha, saying, 'Tumhari mummy sirf mujhse jhagda karti thi.'
  • The exchange highlights their long-standing friendship and shared experiences in the industry.
“Tumhari mummy sirf mujhse jhagda karti thi” - Salman Khan

This nostalgic interaction showcases the bond between the celebrities, drawing in fans of both Raveena and Salman.

item.title: Kiran Rao Opens Up About The Challenges Of Loving Aamir Khan: 'He Is Not A Very...' - News18
item.description:
Kiran Rao Discusses the Complexities of Loving Aamir Khan

Publication Date: January 11, 2025 Source: News18

Kiran Rao opens up about her relationship with Aamir Khan, reflecting on both the joys and challenges of dating a movie star.

  • Kiran Rao and Aamir Khan have a shared history that began on the sets of Swades.
  • She emphasizes the lack of stardom baggage in their relationship, allowing them to connect on common interests.
  • Despite challenges, such as not having glamorous clothing for public appearances, they maintained a close bond.
  • The couple married in 2005 and had a son, Azad, in 2011, but divorced in 2021 while remaining friends.
“He is not a very filmy person... he will hold a cutter or a reflector if need be.” - Kiran Rao

Kiran Rao’s insights reveal the complexities of loving someone in the limelight while valuing authenticity in their relationship.

item.title: Vanangaan Day 1 Tamil Nadu Box Office: Arun Vijay and Roshini Prakash action-drama grosses Rs 1 crore on opening day - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Vanangaan Day 1 Tamil Nadu Box Office: Arun Vijay and Roshini Prakash action-drama grosses Rs 1 crore on opening day

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

Vanangaan, featuring Arun Vijay and Roshini Prakash, opened on January 10, 2025, with a gross of Rs 1 crore in Tamil Nadu on its first day.

  • The film was directed by Bala.
  • It competes against other releases like Madraskaaran, Game Changer, and Fateh.
  • Arun Vijay replaced Suriya in the lead role due to storyline changes.
  • The film is expected to grow its business during the Pongal weekend.
“The much-hyped film can flourish in Tamil Nadu, provided it receives strong word-of-mouth from the audience.”

In conclusion, Vanangaan has had a promising start at the box office, and its performance is anticipated to improve with positive audience feedback.

item.title: Game Changer Hindi Box Office Day 2 (Early Trends): Continues 7 Crore+ Streak On Saturday! - Koimoi
item.description:
Game Changer Hindi Box Office Day 2 (Early Trends): Continues 7 Crore+ Streak On Saturday!

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Koimoi

Ram Charan’s latest film, Game Changer, continues to perform well at the box office, with promising early estimates for its second day.

  • Day 1 earnings were strong at 54 crores net across all languages in India.
  • The Hindi version opened particularly well, earning 8.64 crores.
  • On Day 2, it is estimated to earn between 7-7.50 crores.
  • This reflects a drop of 18-13% from its opening day but maintains a strong total.
  • Game Changer competes with Jr NTR’s Devara, which collected 17.45 crores over two days.
“Despite a regular working Friday, Shankar’s directorial made a stunning opening.”

The film is attracting decent reviews and positive word-of-mouth, promising continued interest.

item.title: Mandy Moore hits back at critics who slammed her for family's LA fire relief fundraiser: ‘Kindly F off’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Mandy Moore Defends Family's Fire Relief Fundraiser Amid Criticism

Date: Jan 11, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Actress Mandy Moore has responded to criticism regarding her family's fire relief fundraiser on social media. Moore shared a GoFundMe link to help her brother-in-law and sister-in-law, Griff and Kit, after they lost their home to the Eaton Fire, highlighting the immediate need for support as they prepare for their first child.

  • Moore's family was affected by the Eaton Fire, which devastated their home.
  • She emphasized their urgent need for help with a baby on the way.
  • Moore faced backlash for promoting the fundraiser, to which she responded strongly.
  • She pointed out that the couple's situation is dire, as Griff, a musician, lost his tools of trade.
  • Moore urged her followers to contribute and show empathy rather than criticism.
“Kindly F OFF. no one is forcing you to do anything.”

In conclusion, Mandy Moore expresses the importance of community support and emotional resilience during such challenging times.
